title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System
Interview Descriptions: Overall it took about an hour. You meet with two managers and they each ask several questions. It’s a pretty relaxed environment. I’d say there was probably 15 questions total
Interview Questions: What is a good reason to miss work?

title: Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System
Interview Descriptions: Questions about work history and about yourself. What your availability was if you could work all shifts. If you had a reliable way to get to work. Your work ethic how well you can work with other people.
Interview Questions: About what my availability looked like.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Roaring Spring, PA) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly and relaxed. Interviewed with 3 people. Benefits were explained really well and so was the description of the practice and the position. Interview process moved smoothly and took about 40 minutes.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for this job?

title: Student Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and got a phone call the next day for an internship. I think I got that call so fast because the deadline was really soon. I was given the choice of an in-person interview, FaceTime, or phone interview. I then scheduled a FaceTime interview for the following week. There was only one interview and she asked very straightforward and typical interview questions. The following week I was offered the position.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for us?, Strengths and Weakness type question

title: Cook Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Johnstown, PA) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: They ask about how you are with people and your work life I had two interviews for the job they give you a tour of the kitchen they ask you the temperatures of what food should be to be cooked  how you cool it down
Interview Questions: Name a Time you had to deal with a difficult customers and how to took care of it

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Johnstown, PA) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview. I would say be prepared about what you would look forward to with the internship and why you are interested in it. Also think of any questions you have for the interviewer.
Interview Questions: What might set you apart, or differentiate you for this position?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Johnstown, PA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was nice, the people were nice as well and very good company. I would've loved the job but under circumstances with family I had to decline. Would love to have another interview to accept for once!

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Ebensburg, PA) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Met with practice manager who managed several sites and was questioned why HR told her to interview me as the on line form did not adequately give room for experience or skills on the form. 

Discussed her site where I used to work, discussed issues that we had "back in the day" and how they were overcome. 

Talked about why giving great care is important and why you need to be a team player and not leave your co-workers stranded. 

Talked about what the employees did in down time (read) and how they handled the stress of being a sole provider on the weekends. 

Asked how long the orientation process usually took, how long to learn the scheduling and payment posting system, and ins and outs of the EMR. 

Discussed rotations and met with other staff. Asked them what they liked best- everything was their answer and what they liked least- nothing was the answer. 

Felt confident I had the skills and abilities they were looking for but did not get a call back or anything to tell me for weeks later they hired someone else.
Interview Questions: How do I feel about working 4 10 hour shifts ?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Johnstown, PA) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Standard interview process, HR impossible to communicate with other than in person, took at least 2-3 weeks to hear a decision, orientation for hospital was 1-2 days long,along with 1-2 day computer orientation.
Interview Questions: Name a challenge in your lifetime that you overcame.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Conemaugh Health System (Johnstown, PA) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions:
First contacted hr, than interviewed by a floor mamager,where I was asked a series of questions.  Then I went to another floor to interview with another manager.

Asked many questions.
